attributes.action: Give a Fair Deal to ENGLAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present formula of funding England is unaceptable in today's times. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister, 
To review the basis of funding, so that England and its people have the same Rights as the people of Scotland and Wales This Government is treating  The Students Elderley and Sick of England unfairly.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
